title: CNC
description:
Questa è una simulazione della fresatrice CNC di alta qualità in 2.5D.
La compensazione del raggio G41 / G42 è inclusa!
Grafica vettoriale molto nitida, zoom.
Facile da usare. Facile da imparare!
Fatto per l'allenamento.

Tutte le funzioni di G&M contengono esempi, puoi simularli tutti!

Lingue: inglese, tedesco, francese, russo, armeno, cinese, giapponese, italiano

Attualmente G & M supportato:
G0, G1, G2, G3, G4, G40, G41, G42, G53, G54, G55, G56, G57, G58, G59, G73, G90, G91, G94, G95, M3, M4, M5, M6, M8, M9, M30, funzioni M definite dall'utente!

La nostra app CNC è destinata alla formazione!
Basta scrivere il tuo codice G e simularlo!
Puoi copiare e incollare qualsiasi esempio nel tuo codice G.

Nella vista del simulatore, tocca il pulsante Condividi per salvare o condividere il codice con tutti i metodi di rilascio comuni.

Impara a programmare il CNC con Stepsintofuture.com

title: EveryCord - Record & Broadcast
description:
EveryCord, by the makers of iRec, flawlessly records your iOS 11+ screen and saves it locally on the device at full HD and 60 FPS. Our app supports device-wide screen capture/recording – it IS NOT a “web browser recorder” that cannot record out of the app. With EveryCord, you can record your entire screen, including your favorite games, moments, and funny videos on the fly with fully customizable settings.

We also support live-streaming directly to YouTube, Twitch, and more services that support RTMP streaming!

title: OmeTV
description:
OmeTV is a secure, fast and free messaging and communication app. Join our global community of people who believe in the power of communication.

What does OmeTV offer?

- Access to all parts of the world:
No matter where you are, OmeTV helps you instantly connect with your loved ones all over the world. Since OmeTV cannot be blocked in any country, you can use it to chat with your friends and family, without using unblocker (VPN) software.

- Data protection:
OmeTV cares about privacy and security. We do not store any of your data on servers. All communication that you make through OmeTV is encrypted between all parties of the connection, so no one - not even OmeTV - can access or hack it.

- Customizable chats:
* Express yourself as you wish. Enjoy your conversations with OmeTV's creative sticker packs. 
* Share your location or your photos/videos with your friends.
* Create group chats for up to 50,000 people each.

- Do More with Less:
OmeTV is a compact and lightweight app for your data and mobile phone battery. Because we're here to serve you, not slow you down.

Text messages with other OmeTV users are always free, try it now and find out more!

We hope you have a great time on OmeTV. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our customer support team at: support@meryem.info

Official web: http://ometv.meryem.info

title: Acidi carbossilici ed esteri
Quiz Strutture Chimiche
description:
Scopri rapidamente le strutture chimiche più importanti. Composti organici e biochimici. Nome sistematico, nome comune  o entrambi. Istruzione secondaria (Scuola superiore). Scelta multipla. Idrocarburi, gruppi funzionali, biomolecole, zuccheri, basi azotate, vitamine, amminoacidi.

Simile alle mie altre app (gratuite). Funziona offline. Nessuna pubblicità.

title: My Mocap
description:
***MARKERLESS MOTION CAPTURE***
***ONLY FOR iPhone XR or newer, and iPad Pro 2018 or newer***

My Mocap allows you to measure dynamic knee valgus, squat depth and many more in real time with your iPhone or iPad, no markers needed! 

It uses cutting-edge Augmented Reality and Machine Learning algorithms to measure your body joints in real time. You just need to point to your athlete with your camera to conduct different tests. My Mocap has 3 incredible modes that will allow you to test your athletes like never before:

*Valgus mode: measures dynamic knee valgus angle during a drop jump, a relevant parameter related with lower body injuries.
*Squat mode: select a desired squat depth (45º,90º, parallel, deep squat, etc.) and it will provide a live feedback when the athlete reaches it.
*Free mode: it tracks 15 relevant landmarks of the human body and allows you to export the full dataset for a complete analysis.

Also, My Mocap has great features like:

-Allows you to create videos of your motion capture sessions
-Save & Sync every test across all your devices with iCloud
-Create as many teams and athletes as you want with no restrictions
-Register as many tests per athletes as you want
-Export the whole data in a CSV file to Excel or other popular apps
-Check your evolution with intuitive graphs


My Mocap, markerless motion capture system in your pocket!

title: WeightLifting Motion Camera
description:
This app is for making bar path tracking of weightlifting in real time.

'Equipment'
1. You can use this App with projector and screen.
2. In order to keep tracking of barbell with practical FPS (more than 20FPS), the 6th generation or later devices are required. (This App is developed with iPhone 7 Plus.)

If you want to ask any questions before purchasing, please visit support page.

'Preparation before starting App'
1. Set up barbell, weight plates and other equipments.
  (See screenshot for sample set up)
2. Connect your device to a projector.(If needed)

'Operation on device'
1. Start App. 
2. Select [Bar path tracker ] and press [Go].
3. The camera of device will be started.
4. Set cursor to the 45cm weight plate and press [Start] button. You can resize the cursor by the slider above.
5. Barbell tracking will be started. The path and vertical velocity of barbell center are shown.
6. You can record the video by iPhone's screen record function (iOS11 later).
7. You can change some settings in [Option] view.

*Note*
The price of app will be changed without any notifications.
The App contains Ads. (But no in-app purchases)
Last validated OS is iOS 13.1.3

'Disclaimers'
A third party can not use the result without permission of who in pictures or movies recorded by this app.
We assume no responsibility or liability for any actions taken as a result of using this Application, or for errors or omissions in content.
